title: Tuk-Tuk drivers want fare hike, following fuel price increase
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); All Island Three-Wheeler Drivers And Owners Association has called on for a revision of three-wheeler fares following the increase in fuel prices.
The Secretary of the Union H.M Nishantha Kumara said that they hope to increase the fare by Rs. 10/- for the first kilometer.
